title: If R is to the west of P , Q is to the east of R ,S is to the south of Q ,in what direction is 5 with respect of P? - Quora

response.answer_text: R is to the west of P, and Q is to the east (opposite of west) of R. That is P , Q and R are on east-west line.Now if S is to the south of Q, it is also to the south of P . (and also south of R)
S is to the south-west of P.
